comment:
>>38903495

“Ael, this way.” You make your way toward the center, then point toward one of the far tunnels. “She's coming from there, right? We'll want to be on the far side so we can go at it from the arm that's more damaged already.”

“I think so.” Aelriss responds. “Unless she got turned around, which is entirely possible. If anything, we'll want to be at a diagonal, to minimize the distance you have to cross if we're on the wrong side.”

“Hey, Ashe!” On the far side of the central chamber, you see Nel leading a small group—Donnel, Dorian, and Andor—face dimly illuminated from below by his map projection. “Glad to see you're on your feet!”

“Yes, you've made a lot of people very upset.” Dorian sighs.

“That's cool,” You say. “I'll make up for it. Where do you want us, Nel?”

“Aelriss gave me the low-down on everything that's going on here, so just pick a spot I guess. Once I work out positions for the four of us I'm going to defer to your judgment.” He says, folding his arms. “Sticking with Aelriss?”

“Yeah,” You nod. “You know, I don't trust her alone.”

“Hey.” Aelriss snaps. “Watch it.”

“Take it easy, you two. Nel, Kainzo was right, wasn't he?” Andor says. “See? There's more ways to contribute to a team than just dealing damage. Without a map of this place, we'd have been picked off one-by-one.”

> [[ Continued ]]
name: Sylvetica
